General.Name: Techbond Group Bhd
General.Description: Techbond Group Berhad develops, manufactures, and trades in industrial adhesives and sealants in Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, and internatioally. The company offers industrial adhesives, including water-based and hot melt adhesives; and industrial sealants, such as water-based and solvent-based sealants. It also provides products and services comprising OEM industrial adhesives and sealants, chemicals, and adhesive repellents, as well as adhesive blending machines; and cleaners, spare parts, and maintenance services. The company's industrial adhesives are used in manufacturing a range of products, including wood-based products, paper and packaging products, cigarettes and cigarette packs, automotive applications, personal care products, and mattresses, as well as building and construction applications. It also exports to approximately 20 countries in Asia, Europe, and Africa continents. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Techbond Group Berhad is a subsidiary of Sonicbond Sdn. Bhd.
